• splashscreen //Help Dialogs Do not show again. Saving bookmarks Show again: Saving bookmarks? To save a bookmark simply click on the pink button. If you want to bookmark a city it is important, that the \"Überblick\" button on the website is blue and checked. Otherwise it is later not possible to load the hourly und the 10 day trend forecast of a city.

If you clicked the pink button a popup appears. You can now edit the title of the bookmark. Normally you enter the name of the city. Browser Show again: Functionality of the browser? Your bookmarked websites are shown in this browser. If you have no internet connection they will be loaded offline from the cache. For saved cities you can click the orange button and switch between the overview, the hourly and the 10 day trend forecast.

Sites from the \"Deutscher Wetterdienst\" and \"Meteoblue\", which can be also bookmarked do not have the orange button.

You can switch back to the bookmark list or to your favorite (look into the settings) by swiping to the right or by clicking the titlebar. Swipe down to reload the website. Bookmark list Show again: Tip about the bookmark list? The list:
This is your bookmark list. The first bookmark is your favorite. It can be loaded on app start or on title bar click (look in the settings).

Edit bookmarks:
Long click on a bookmark opens a popup menu. You can edit title and URL of the bookmark or delete it (at least one bookmark is needed). If you have problems to open the hourly or the 10 day forecast of a bookmarked city you must control the URL. It should look like this: http://www.wetterdienst.de/Deutschlandwetter/name_of_yor_city. If this is not the case, correct it.

Search new cities:
If you click the pink button the website of wetterdienst.de opens. There you can search worldwide for cities. Just enter the name in the search field and make your joice. Making screenshots Show again: Taking screenshots? You can make screenshots of the whole website (even of the part which is outside of your display.
